snippet: As of Friday, the S.&P. 500 is up 10 percent so far this year. For the week, the S.&P. 500 and the Dow closed up about a third of a percentage point, their fourth week of gains.
lead_paragraph: As of Friday, the S.&P. 500 is up 10 percent so far this year. For the week, the S.&P. 500 and the Dow closed up about a third of a percentage point, their fourth week of gains.

headline.main: Gains Stretch Into a Fourth Straight Week
headline.print_headline: Gains Stretch Into a Fourth Straight Week
